snippet: Johannsson, a striker for the United States national team, is on the verge of a move from the Netherlands to Germany that stops a migration of top American pros out of Europe.
abstract: Aron Johannsson, striker for United States men's national soccer team, will stay in Europe, moving from Dutch team AZ Alkmaar to Germany's Werder Bremen; move makes Johannsson only American forward likely to see regular minutes in one of Europe's top leagues.
lead_paragraph: Johannsson, a striker for the United States national team, is on the verge of a move from the Netherlands to Germany that stops a migration of top American pros out of Europe.

headline.main: Aron Johannsson’s Impending Transfer Slows a Talent Leak
headline.print_headline: American’s Move Slows a Talent Leak in Europe

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
